posts.post_content:
Hello everyone. I have seven Series 8 cards for trade today. My trade needs are a bit more specific this time around. I am looking to add the last few cards I need in Series 5, 6 & 7. Also I have a small want list of 5 T209 Richmond Colts. I will trade in your favor if you happen to be able to help out. Thank you as always and I look forward to a few pleasant deals!

Burnett PSA 1 TRADED
Greminger SGC 20 SOLD
Marcan SGC 35 135.00
Patterson SGC A Chattanooga! TRADED
Rhodes SGC A Chattanooga! TRADED
Rogers SGC 30 135.00
Siegle SGC 20 115.00

Scans available upon request. Please send your email address.
Prices added and still trading. Thank you!
Lowered to get them to a good home!
